body:
Comment 4: 
I have traced this to

changeset:   6559:52618323fda8
user:        Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
date:        Tue Oct 19 18:07:19 2010 -0400
summary:     5l, 6l, 8l: link pclntab and symtab as ordinary rodata symbols

gdb can read the symbols correctly and do all the line number stuff correctly, so the
problem could be in libmach getting the incorrect offset for the pc-line table.
